waitlist.hero.title: Plan your perfect
waitlist.hero.subtitle: Your all-in-one
waitlist.hero.description: Send updates to all your guests, let our assistant reply instantly, and watch your CRM stay in syncâ€”so you can focus on the celebration.
waitlist.whatsapp.title: Send invitations to all your guests <1>in one click</1>
waitlist.whatsapp.subtitle: Reach all your guests instantly through <1>WhatsApp</1>. Send personalized invitations, updates, and reminders effortlessly.
waitlist.whatsapp.bulkMessaging.title: Bulk Messaging
waitlist.whatsapp.bulkMessaging.desc: Send invitations to multiple guests simultaneously
waitlist.whatsapp.templates.title: Message Templates
waitlist.whatsapp.templates.desc: Use pre-approved templates or create custom designs with our template builder
waitlist.whatsapp.realtime.title: Real-time Updates
waitlist.whatsapp.realtime.desc: Keep everyone in sync with instant notifications
waitlist.whatsapp.scheduled.title: Scheduled Messages
waitlist.ai.title: AI-Powered Assistant for <1>Every Guest Question</1>
waitlist.ai.subtitle: Our intelligent chatbot handles all guest inquiries 24/7, providing accurate information about your event using advanced AI technology.
waitlist.ai.instant.title: Instant Responses
waitlist.ai.instant.desc: Get immediate answers to common questions about venue, timing, dress code, and more.
waitlist.ai.context.title: Context-Aware
waitlist.ai.context.desc: The AI understands your event details and provides personalized responses.
waitlist.ai.suggestions.title: Smart Suggestions
waitlist.ai.suggestions.desc: Proactively offers relevant information like directions, parking details, and accommodation options.
waitlist.rsvp.title: Smart RSVP Tracking with <1>Zero Effort</1>
waitlist.rsvp.subtitle: Automatically track guest responses and manage attendance without the hassle. Our AI understands natural language responses and updates RSVP status in real-time.
waitlist.rsvp.automatic.title: Automatic Status Updates
waitlist.rsvp.automatic.desc: AI automatically detects and updates RSVP status from natural chat responses.
waitlist.rsvp.followups.title: Smart Follow-ups
waitlist.rsvp.followups.desc: Automated reminders for pending responses with perfect timing.
waitlist.rsvp.intelligence.title: We're using <1>Intelligence</1> to make your life easier
waitlist.rsvp.intelligence.desc: Guest attendance is automatically updated based on their responses.
waitlist.form.getStartedDescription: Get exclusive access to our wedding planning platform

waitlist.form.successMessage: We've received your request. We'll be in touch soon with your access details.

waitlist.chatAssistant.title: Wedding Assistant
waitlist.chatAssistant.guest.question1: What time does the ceremony start?
waitlist.chatAssistant.assistant.answer1: The ceremony starts at 4:00 PM at Santa Maria Church. I recommend arriving by 3:30 PM to find parking and get seated comfortably. Would you like directions to the venue?
waitlist.chatAssistant.assistant.answer2: The dress code is Cocktail Attire. Here's what that means:
Men: Suit or blazer with dress pants
Women: Cocktail dress or elegant separates
pricing.header.title: Say <purple>"I do"</purple> to the perfect plan
pricing.header.subtitle: Pick the tools that match your wedding season

pricing.singleEvent.title: Single Event Option
pricing.singleEvent.description: Perfect for those planning a single special event. All the features you need, just for one celebration.
pricing.singleEvent.oneTime:
No recurring charges.
One-time payment for one event.
pricing.features.generalEventInfoDesc: The essentials: when, where, and what to expect
pricing.features.seatAssignmentDesc: No more "Don't put Uncle Bob next to Aunt Mary" drama
pricing.features.detailedEventInfoDesc: Because "Casual Attire" means different things to different people
pricing.features.coupleAccountDesc: Individual access to the dashboard for both the couple
pricing.features.templateBuilderDesc: Craft messages that make guests hit "Save the Date" instantly
pricing.features.chatbotTestingDesc: Impersonate guests to see how AI handles "OMG! I'm so in! ðŸŽ‰"

events.duplicate.questionsEmpty: The new event will have no questions.
events.duplicate.questionsSuggestion: Questions train the event's chatbot. We recommend copying the questions from the source event and then reviewing/editing them to fit this specific event.
events.duplicate.managersAccessNote: These users will gain access if shared.
events.duplicate.shareAccessEnabled: Event Managers with access to the original event will automatically get access to this new event.
events.duplicate.shareAccessDisabled: Only you will initially have access. You can grant access to others later.

chatbot.chatbotDisabledDesc: The chatbot is turned off for this event. Guests will not receive automated responses. However, you can still simulate conversations with the chatbot by sending messages as a guest.
chatbot.simulationNote: Note: These system actions are only visible here in testing mode. Guests will not see these in actual WhatsApp conversations, and no actions are actually executed in this testing mode.
